summary: The 'Pay Our Correctional Officers Fairly Act' aims to increase locality pay for Bureau of Prisons employees.  It mandates that employees working in the 'Rest of U.S.' pay locality receive pay comparable to the nearest higher-paying locality, considering proximity.  The bill also addresses prevailing rate employees within different wage areas, ensuring they receive the appropriate wage schedule and rate. The Act's amendments take effect 180 days after enactment.
